makers who are typically the counterparty would start buying shares to cover the new risk meaning in case they fall in the money and they have to deliver then as they are buying shares that moves price up a little bit into the next strike and if there's enough open interest at the next strike that was at the money they have to start buying more to hedge that risk and then it pushes it to the next strike and then that's how a gamma ramp is built so right now there's just not enough depth in these options to actually serve as an actual gamma ramp just for a a General understanding about more so how those will perform so um and then the idea of a couple other players following along it does look like that because the volume today was over 20,000 so this actually popped up on a couple of my scans today just because of the activity pretty drastically exceeding in already high oi so yeah definitely other people moved along however if you've watched my other videos on stuff like GameStop you already know that at these kind of more primary expirations as I refer to them as you're going to tend to see more concentration so what that means is anything that ends in like a zero or a five will tend to have more volume than things that are in the middle and definitely whole number strikes as compared to half strikes
